message.content: I am designed to be helpful and provide information, but there are certain topics I won't discuss, such as how to engage in illegal or harmful activities. I can also choose not to engage if you try to use me to spread hate or hurt someone. Otherwise, I try to provide accurate and helpful information. Can I help you with something?

conversation_history.text: Do you ever say no to certain requests?

I am designed to be helpful and provide information, but there are certain topics I won't discuss, such as how to engage in illegal or harmful activities. I can also choose not to engage if you try to use me to spread hate or hurt someone. Otherwise, I try to provide accurate and helpful information. Can I help you with something?
